review.rating: Where Island Time Feels Just Right!
review.comment_positive:
We recently stayed at this wonderful hotel for two nights, and it was truly a delightful experience. The owner, Van, his wife and the staff were incredibly hospitable, going above and beyond to ensure a memorable stay. Van stands out for his genuine effort to help tourists save money on tours/taxis etc, a rarity in the industry. He is really helpful and able to communicate well in many languages: English, Russian, Chinese and Vietnamese. 

Surprisingly, the hotel allows guests to use the kitchen facilities, and the staff can even cook delicious meals for a small additional fee. The nearby local market provides exceptional fresh seafood at local prices, enhancing the overall culinary experience as well as cultural experience. 

The hotel's beachfront location is a standout feature, with a beautiful terrace offering stunning ocean views,  the beach is literally just a step away.

The rooms were a highlight of the stayâ€” newly built, clean, well-designed, and incredibly cozy. Having visited Phu Quoc Island four times, I can confidently say that this hotel is among the best I've experienced for the money. Highly recommended for a memorable and comfortable stay in this beautiful destination.

review.comment_positive: Very good location & the owner is very kind and helpful.

Tres sympathique hotel en bord de mer, proche du marche, de bons restaurants locaux !  
Les chambres et les lieux communs sont tres propres. On se sent comme a la maison et en famille.
Nous avons apprecie surtout la gentillesse du couple proprietaire gerants qui sont toujours aux petits soins pour leurs clients : conseils de sorties, de bons restaurants, taxis, etc.
Le gerant est surtout tres prevenant envers les personnes agees ( que nous sommes) en nous faisant beneficier de tarifs reduits pour les visites  des lieux touristiques ! 
A notre depart, le gerant a meme recommande a notre chauffeur de taxi de bien nous deposer a la gare maritime et nous a appele a l arrivee du bateau pour s assurer que nous sommes bien arrives !
Nous recommandons fortement cet hotel pour l attention particuliere et chaleureuse du gerant vis a vis des clients d un certain age.

review.comment_positive:
I recently had the pleasure of staying at the Poplar Hotel, and I felt compelled to express my sincere gratitude for the exceptional hospitality I experienced during my visit.

From the moment I arrived, the warmth and friendliness extended by the entire staff, especially the owner, made my stay truly memorable. The owner went above and beyond to ensure our comfort and satisfaction. Their genuine kindness and willingness to assist us in every way possible made a significant impact on our overall experience.

The hotel's strategic location was another highlight of our stay. The convenience of not needing to purchase entry tickets, thanks to the owner's assistance, added tremendous value to our visit. This thoughtful gesture not only saved us money but also exemplified the hotel's commitment to ensuring a seamless and enjoyable stay for its guests.

I must also commend the hotel's culinary offerings. The local home-cooked meals served were nothing short of exceptional. The quality, authenticity, and remarkably reasonable prices set the dining experience at [Poplar Hotel] apart from anything we could find outside. It truly felt like a home away from home, and we thoroughly enjoyed every meal.

In summary, our stay at the Poplar Hotel exceeded all expectations, and I wholeheartedly recommend it to fellow travelers. The combination of superb hospitality, a prime location, and delicious home-cooked meals makes Poplar Hotel a standout choice.

Thank you once again for making our visit so special. I look forward to the opportunity to return and experience your outstanding hospitality again.

We had an amazing time at the resort. The owner and his family are so friendly. The rooms are new and nice, the private beach and sunset view is amazing. Is really is a family like feeling, you can use the kitchen and washing machine for free. They also have nice chillout areas. 
The location is in a nice quiet part of phu quoc inside a local fishing village. Supermarket and local market are nearby, you can also walk 30 minutes (or 4 minutes grab) into the city.
We enjoyed it so much, we extended our stay! We will definitely return!

review.rating: A must visit for a comfortable staying in Phu Quoc.
review.comment_positive:
I had the pleasure of staying at Poplar Resort PhÃº Quá»‘c for four nights, and it was an absolutely delightful experience from start to finish. From the moment I arrived, the owner, Van, went above and beyond to ensure that my stay was nothing short of exceptional.

Van's hospitality truly stood out during my time at the resort. He was incredibly helpful and accommodating, always ready to assist me with any queries or requests I had. From booking attractions to arranging bike rentals and providing valuable recommendations for places to visit, Van's guidance was invaluable and greatly enhanced my stay. His warm and friendly demeanor made me feel right at home, and I genuinely appreciated his attentiveness throughout my stay.

The resort itself exceeded all expectations. The room was immaculately clean and beautifully appointed, exactly as depicted in the photos. The bed was exceptionally comfortable, ensuring a restful night's sleep after a day of exploring the island. I particularly appreciated the spacious shower, which was separate from the toilet room.

In conclusion, I recommend Poplar Resort PhÃº Quá»‘c. From the exceptional hospitality of Van to the impeccable cleanliness and comfort of the accommodations, every aspect of my stay was nothing short of excellent. If you're looking for a welcoming retreat on PhÃº Quá»‘c Island, look no further than Poplar Resort. It's truly a hidden gem that exceeded all my expectations, and I can't wait to return in the future.

review.rating: Excellent family-run hotel by the sea.
review.comment_positive: We stayed in this small and cosy hotel 11 nights. Upon arrival the owner greeted us with a warm welcome and guided us to our room. The rooms were clean, towels and linen fresh. Also tea, coffee and drinking water were provided for free. The same evening the owner gave us recommendations what to do on the island and where to go. He even explained the road conditions in detail since we wanted to rent a scooter for mobility. He also asked to contact him first if we wanted to visit different attractions on the island. This turned out to be an excellent idea because the prices at gates were significantly higher than he offered to us :) He also organized a group of hotel visitors to a private trip to starfish beach, which would have been much more expensive on our own. Another great feature of this wonderful stay was the fact that we were able to buy sea food from the local central market and their staff helped us to prepare it in local way for a small fee. This was an excellent alternative to restaurants that were quite expensive on the island compared to regular prices in Vietnam. With the help of their staff we managed to save our valuable time and hundreds of thousands in local currency.
The owner were really friendly and helpful.

Nice small family-motel in a fisherman's village.

We absolutely loved our stay at this well located, spotlessly clean, lovely hotel on the beach. Van, his wife and staff are fantastic. Van did everything to make our stay wonderful, he is very accommodating arranging excursions that are very cost effective for his guests. The rooms are lovely and well furnished providing all your need. If you want dinner cooked on the BBQ Van arranges for his staff to cook for you it is always excellent quality and very tasty, you can either buy your own food from the local market or he will arrange for his staff to buy it for you. You can use the kitchen and really treat the hotel like home.
The beach is lovely and right on your doorstep. The hotel is close to shops, many restaurants, the local market and a short taxi ride from the centre. 
All in all it was an amazing experience staying at The Poplar Resort. I absolutely recommend this hotel

review.rating: A fabulous little stop.  Would definitely reccommend.
review.comment_positive: What a great little find.  Overlooking the beach with a beautiful sunset.  It was so nice to see the fishing boats coming in at sunrise.  At sunset was lovely to watch the children splashing in the sea & playing volleyball.  The hosts were such a lovely family & provided everything we needed, including lots of advice on the sights to see around.  The street markets within 5 minutes walk, as well as a supermarket & reliable ATM which came in handy. We would definitely come back here, it was a fabulous little stop.

review.comment_positive: Van the owner is the most welcoming, kind and helpful host I've ever met! He truly treats everyone like family - is generous with his time - he helps with literally any requests (he helped book my onward boat trip), coordinates trips with other visitors to help reduce costs and makes wonderful recommendations for things to do and see. You can also have dinner cooked for you if you want - just have to inform Van and then it is done! The room was very comfortable and i felt very much like it was a home from home. The accommodation is a little north of the tourist centre (more locals and fishing boats) but it was beautiful and I really liked it - you can just hop on a motorbike (my favourite thing to do - Van can easily help arrange a driver) or in a taxi and off you go. Many people who stayed kept extending their visits and I was also tempted but I had onward reservations booked already. I wish Van and his family all the success - it's a wonderful place and I really do recommend you stay!
